content.question: Which of the following best describes the change in coyote behavior in the presence of wolves?

choices.label: Rest Travel Hunt Feeding on Carcasses Vigilance Increases No effect No effect Decreases Decreases
RestTravelHuntFeeding on CarcassesVigilanceIncreases Decreases No effect Decreases Decreases
RestTravelHuntFeeding on CarcassesVigilanceDecreases No effect No effect Increases Increases
RestTravelHuntFeeding on CarcassesVigilanceDecreases Increases No effect Increases Increases

content.answer: RestTravelHuntFeeding on CarcassesVigilanceDecreases No effect No effect Increases Increases

skill.text: 5.B: Use confidence intervals and error bars to estimate whether sample means are statistically different.
